content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or emotions like humans. However, I can provide you with some information on Rick Rubin and his recent work.

Rick Rubin has been one of the most influential producers in the music industry for several decades. In recent years, he has continued to work with a diverse range of artists, including Lady Gaga, Kanye West, and the Avett Brothers. One of his most recent projects was producing the album "Cyrs" for the Smashing Pumpkins, which was released in 2020. The album features Rubin's signature stripped-down approach to production, with a focus on raw emotions and storytelling. Rubin's ability to bring out the best in his artists and help them create timeless music has made him one of the most respected producers in the industry.
